turtle.brief: This process describes the steps involved in requesting a new job position within the organization.
turtle.inputs:
Departmental Needs Assessment
Job Description Draft
Budget Approval
Organizational Chart
turtle.process:
Step 1: Identify the need for a new position within the department.
Step 2: Draft a job description outlining the responsibilities and qualifications.
Step 3: Obtain budget approval from the finance department.
Step 4: Submit the job position request to the HR department.
Step 5: HR reviews the request and job description.
Step 6: HR posts the job opening internally and externally.
Step 7: HR screens applications and conducts initial interviews.
Step 8: HR forwards shortlisted candidates to the hiring manager.
Step 9: Hiring manager conducts final interviews and selects a candidate.
Step 10: HR extends a job offer to the selected candidate.
turtle.outputs:
Approved Job Position
Job Posting
Shortlisted Candidates
Job Offer
turtle.what:
Job Description Template
Budget Approval Form
HR Software
Interview Questions
Job Offer Letter
turtle.how:
Follow the organization's job request and approval procedures.
Use HR software to manage job postings and applications.
Conduct interviews following the company's interview guidelines.
turtle.support:
HR Policies and Procedures Manual
Budget Approval Guidelines
Interview Training Materials
Job Description Templates
turtle.results:
Efficient Hiring Process
Qualified Candidate Hired
Departmental Needs Met
Compliance with Organizational Policies
